## plugin-memberships package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Memberships](./plugin-memberships.memberships.md) | Memberships represent a person's relationship to a room. Use this API to list members of any room that you're in or create memberships to invite someone to a room. Memberships can also be updated to make someone a moderator or deleted to remove them from the room.   Memberships |
